New Records: James Harden moved into second place on the NBA's career 3-point list with 2,874
Key Match Events: Harden's first-quarter 3-pointer that moved him past Ray Allen
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ivica Zubac had 22 points and 11 rebounds for Los Angeles, and Norman Powell added 18 points. The Clippers led by 23 points in the first half to win their fourth consecutive game in the new Intuit Dome
Others: Mo Bamba made his Clippers debut after opening the season with a left knee soreness. He had nine points with eight rebounds in 15 minutes
